= Screen shots = 
The following screen shot sequence shows the tipical steps involved while solving a [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Minimum_cost_flow Minimum Cost Flow network problem], in this case, the [http://gnuoflox.googlecode.com/files/pfmcexx1.min PFMCEXX1] problem.

= List of examples =
